example.text: The skyrocketing cost of goods and services will cost the average American household over $700 per month , which adds up to over $8,000 per year . President Biden's cost of living crisis has hit Arizonans even harder.

I am also pleased to once again serve on the Subcommittee on Innovation, Data, and Commerce. I am looking forward to working with my colleagues on both sides of the aisle to oversee the travel and tourism industry, an important aspect of Arizona's growing economy.

We will fight this crisis and work to lower the cost of living for Arizonans and families across America. Around the District Monica from our office attended the ribbon cutting for the grand opening of Word of Life Arizona, a church located in El Mirage, AZ.

Lesko Protects Emergency Oil Reserve from Communist China Thanks to the Biden Administration, oil from our Strategic Petroleum Reserve is now in the hands of the Chinese Communist Party. I was proud to vote for critical legislation to ensure our emergency oil supply is not sold off to our enemies.

Lesko Honors Brandon Caserta I was honored to recognize fallen US Navy Petty Officer Third Class Brandon Caserta from Peoria, AZ on the US House Floor. Thanks to the tireless efforts of his parents, the Brandon Act became law to honor Brandon's legacy and help service members quickly seek mental health care.
